statements: SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM high_risk_patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients WHERE risk_factor = 'High';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM high_risk_patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, monitoring_required FROM high_risk_patients WHERE monitoring_required = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, risk_factor FROM high_risk_patients WHERE monitoring_required = true;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_high_risk_patients FROM high_risk_patients WHERE risk_factor = 'High';
SELECT patient_name, age, monitoring_required FROM high_risk_patients ORDER BY age LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 AND monitoring_required = false ORDER BY age ASC, patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM high_risk_patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM high_risk_patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, diagnosis FROM high_risk_patients ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT patient_conditions.condition_name, patient_conditions.action_needed, high_risk_patients.first_name, high_risk_patients.last_name FROM patient_conditions INNER JOIN high_risk_patients ON patient_conditions.patient_id = high_risk_patients.patient_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, diagnosis FROM high_risk_patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, condition_name, action_needed FROM patient_conditions WHERE condition_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY condition_name ASC
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients p JOIN patient_conditions c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id WHERE p.age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY p.age ASC, c.condition_name DESC
SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name, age, diagnosis FROM high_risk_patients WHERE diagnosis IN ('Cancer', 'Diabetes') ORDER BY age DESC, full_name ASC

SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age, diagnosis, action_needed FROM high_risk_patients p LEFT JOIN patient_conditions c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id WHERE c.condition_name IS NULL ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM high_risk_patients
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_date, outcome FROM interventions
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, risk_score FROM high_risk_patients
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM health_records
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT hr.record_date, hr.diagnosis, i.intervention_type FROM health_records hr JOIN interventions i ON hr.patient_id = i.patient_id WHERE hr.diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' AND i.outcome = 'success'

SELECT hp.first_name, hp.last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interventions FROM high_risk_patients hp JOIN interventions i ON hp.patient_id = i.patient_id GROUP BY hp.first_name, hp.last_name ORDER BY total_interventions DESC

SELECT hp.first_name, hp.last_name, hr.diagnosis, i.intervention_type FROM high_risk_patients hp LEFT JOIN health_records hr ON hp.patient_id = hr.patient_id LEFT JOIN interventions i ON hp.patient_id = i.patient_id
SELECT hp.first_name, hp.last_name, AVG(hp.risk_score) AS avg_risk_score FROM high_risk_patients hp WHERE hp.age BETWEEN 40 AND 60 GROUP BY hp.first_name, hp.last_name ORDER BY avg_risk_score DESC
SELECT * FROM HighRiskPatients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM HighRiskPatients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM HighRiskPatients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT intervention_name, intervention_date FROM Interventions WHERE intervention_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HighRiskPatients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, temperature FROM HighRiskPatients JOIN PatientVitals ON HighRiskPatients.patient_id = PatientVitals.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE patient_id = 101 ORDER BY medication_name;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_name, intervention_date FROM Interventions WHERE intervention_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate, MAX(blood_pressure) AS max_blood_pressure FROM PatientVitals;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM high_risk_patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY blood_pressure ASC;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_patients;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM high_risk_patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT h.patient_name, d.provider_name FROM high_risk_patients h JOIN patient_doctors pd ON h.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN healthcare_providers d ON pd.provider_id = d.provider_id;
SELECT h.patient_name, v.heart_rate, v.blood_pressure FROM high_risk_patients h JOIN vital_signs v ON h.patient_id = v.patient_id WHERE v.heart_rate > 100 AND v.blood_pressure = 'High';
